text: The prostaglandins , especially prostaglandin E 2 ( PGE 2 ) amplify the pain mechanism and enhance vascular permeability whereas the leukotrienes contract the smooth muscles of blood vessels , enhance vascular permeability and mediate proinflammatory and allergic responses [ 97 ] .
